justification: Shows some ToM by pitching B a ceiling RB upgrade that fits B’s risk profile and consensus-leaning tendencies, but it barely references B’s reliance on expert rankings and ignores that B parts with rookies they value. Trade is broadly coherent (B upgrades RB; A gains rookie depth), yet rationale misstates “injury-prone vets” and overgeneralizes schedules (only Darian has friendly playoffs). Explanation is brief and vague, with limited evidence-based detail.
